nl.tudelft.simulation.dsol.animation.D2

Class AnimationPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • nl.tudelft.simulation.dsol.animation.D2.GridPanel
              • nl.tudelft.simulation.dsol.animation.D2.AnimationPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.naming.event.NamespaceChangeListener, javax.naming.event.NamingListener, nl.tudelft.simulation.event.EventListenerInterface

    public class AnimationPanel
extends GridPanel
implements nl.tudelft.simulation.event.EventListenerInterface, javax.naming.event.NamespaceChangeListener
    The AnimationPanel to display animated (Locatable) objects. Added the possibility to witch layers on and off. By default all layers will be drawn, so no changes to existing software need to be made.
    copyright (c) 2002-2018 Delft University of Technology , the Netherlands.
    See for project information www.simulation.tudelft.nl
    License of use: Lesser General Public License (LGPL) , no warranty.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.2 $ $Date: 2010/08/10 11:37:49 $
    Author:
    Peter Jacobs
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
